summary: Lets you spar with your followers to up your skills!
descriptionHtml:
PROBABLY WONT WORK WITH THE LATEST PATCH.

This file contains two text files to be used ingame. This lets you spar with your followers to increase your skills.

How to use: Extract the content to your Data folder. Ingame, make sure you and your follower are in a secluded place so no other npc's gets involved in the "fight". Now, target your follower and type "bat sparstart" in the console then dismiss your follower. This will start the sparring. I made sure the player won't die during the progress.

When you think you're done, just bring up the console and type "bat sparstop".


I fully recommend using this with a mod that makes all the follower npc's essential.


If someone is to turn this to an actual .esp mod, please notify me and I will take this down. I'd love to see my idea turned into something better. :)
author: T3alrose
